attributes.action: Make preparations for the collapse of the transport economy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When road pricing comes in it will result in travel becoming a luxury, as in victorian times. This will cause a reduction in income from vehicle taxation, insurance, fuel sales, car sales and tourism to name a few. Unemployment will go up because it will become too expensive to live more than a short bus journey from work (include me). My suggestion is a factory and retail site at the end of every street, as in Victorian times.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/UK-Transport/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
